Classes in niagara.query_engine used by niagara.query_engine
ActiveQueryList
          The ActiveQueryList class is used to store the queries that are active in the query engine.
ActiveQueryList.NoSuchQueryException
          This exception is thrown if an attempt is made to remove a query that does not exist
ActiveQueryList.QueryIdAlreadyPresentException
          This exception is thrown if an attempt is made to add a query with an existing id
ContainTreeNode
          A tree of ContainTreeNode forms a containment tree.

          Exception thrown when extracting and pushing search engine queries from query engine queries

QueryOptimizer
          This class is used to optimize a logical plan and return an optimized logical plan
QueryQueue
          The QueryQueue class stores queries as they are entered into the QueryEngine.
